description:
Perfectly located only moments away from Keilor Road shops and the Calder Fwy access is this great sized property in a highly sought area. The three bedroom home offers all the comforts including big spaces and conveniences, heating and more. Accompanying this property are proposed development plans for a 3 unit multi-dwelling site, featuring beautiful and sizeable two bedroom townhouses ready to develop. In an ever growing suburb of excellent property value, this beauty will suit a growing family, builder or developer.

Proposed double storey units comprise:
Unit 1: 154sqm approx. / 2 bed, 2 bath, 1 garage
Unit 2: 116sqm approx. / 2 bed, 2 bath, 1 garage
Unit 3: 142sqm approx. / 2 bed, 2 bath, 1 garage

Highlights
- Approx 608sqm property
- Separate living room with heating
- Evaporative cooling throughout
- Solar Panels
- Well maintained bathroom + powder room
- Good sized carpeted bedrooms, master with BIR
- Spacious kitchen and meals area + large internal laundry
- Long driveway to rear garage + 2 sheds
- Close to the Calder Fwy and major artillery roads across Melbourne
- Positioned only moments' drive away from Westfields Airport West shopping, Keilor Road shops and eateries, and exciting indoor activity centres
- Short distance to many reserves, playing grounds, football, tennis and cricket clubs
- Excellent connectivity via public transport
- Within 8 minutes to DFO Essendon, 15mins to Highpoint Shopping Centre and Melbourne Zoo
- Within the school catchment zones for Niddrie Primary School, St. Christophers primary school, Essendon Keilor College and various quality private schools for children
- Direct access to Melbourne CBD in approx. 18 minutes, Docklands in 15mins and Tullamarine Airport in 10mins

All information about this property has been provided to Ray White by third parties. Ray White has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
